00035   class state_product : public state
00036   {
00037   public:
00043     state_product(state* left, state* right)
00044       : left_(left),
00045         right_(right)
00046     {
00047     }
00048 
00050     state_product(const state_product& o);
00051 
00052     virtual ~state_product();
00053 
00054     state*
00055     left() const
00056     {
00057       return left_;
00058     }
00059 
00060     state*
00061     right() const
00062     {
00063       return right_;
00064     }
00065 
00066     virtual int compare(const state* other) const;
00067     virtual size_t hash() const;
00068     virtual state_product* clone() const;
00069 
00070   private:
00071     state* left_;               
00072     state* right_;              
00073   };
